'''1.21.5 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.5-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.5]], released on March 20, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-5-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.5 Release Candidate 1|March 20, 2025}}</ref> This is the first release candidate released in 2025.
